author: Dr15Jones
body:
-Replaced the direct calls to DQMStore with implicit calls via the internals of one::DQMEDAnalyzer. This also has the benefit of making this no longer a legacy module.
-Added the one::DQMEDAnalyzer class to explicitly handle the case where a module must be a one module and must communicate with the DQM infrastructure.
title: Convert BeamMonitor to be a one::DQMEDAnalyzer
